user_query: My friend is following a strict diet and needs to know the nutritional information of a recipe. Can you analyze the nutrition data for a dish containing chicken, broccoli, and quinoa? Also, calculate the carbon footprint from a flight from Los Angeles to New York City.

TaskList.description: Analyze the nutritional information of a recipe containing chicken, broccoli, and quinoa.
Calculate the carbon footprint for a flight from Los Angeles to New York City.
